ModMetaData.name: ED-EnhancedOptions
ModMetaData.author: Jaxxa
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 0.18.0.0 Discussion, Non Steam Downloads and GitHub Repositories of this mod is available at: https://ludeon.com/forums/index.php?topic=37158
Please Check the Mod Settings by going into the Options, Selecting "Mod Options" and then "ED-EnhancedOptions".
This mod adds various aditional options to change the way Rimworld works. These options are as follows: - Stop Letters from being shown. - Allow Plants to Grow 24H a day, also changes SunLamps." - Prevents Traps from triggering on your Colonists. - Allows force attack commands to be given to turrets. - Hides the Small Power Connection Wires, Still show in Power overlay Mode.
